resources.string: You are an African American teenager from Philadelphia. American Bandstand continues to use Jim Crow era tactics to unofficially segregate the studio. Can you get in?"
How early do you start to plan your trip?
I send an application in 2 weeks early because that is what my friend did when she went.
I show up same day like the poster said to!
Where do you say you go to school?
West Catholic High School for Girls
West Catholic High School for Boys
What do say is your last name?
You never hear back from the studio. Do you show up same day anyway?
Sorry, but you end up watching from home.
Sorry! No early approval means you do not get it.
So you argue. How do you fight this?
I yell and say it is not fair! The doorman just let a white person in without a membership card!
A fight breaks out between and you a white teenager trying to pass in front of you.
They say they are at capacity and you are not allowed to go in.
They let you in! But as the show goes on, you notice that the camera never points near you.
